faq.description: You can search for answers to your issues or find out how to use the features of this application below. Just type what you are looking for, and we will help you resolve it.
faq.title: Having Trouble with This Application?

multifunction.description: Easily handle your correspondence needs, from signing, submitting, to delivering documents to others. This application works on various screen sizes and platforms, offering customization options, including flexible language settings.
multifunction.title: Responsive and Versatile Application

signature_qr.description: We provide a digital signature feature with QR code to ensure the authenticity and security of your reports. You can place signatures interactively and easily verify documents.
signature_qr.title: Want to Sign a Report?

content.description: A superior digital archiving solution for secure, efficient, and integrated management of military documents
content.promote: Simplify your correspondence with the help of a SPARTI

search.filter_placeholder: Search by letter number, sender name, creator name, or subject.

file_input.label: Select the file you want to upload or drag the file to this area.

message.not_found: Sorry, what you were looking for was not found
message.replace_file_confirmation: The previous file will be replaced. Are you sure?
message.remove_file_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this file?
